description: Detects the execution of rundll32 with a command line that doesn't contain a .dll file
name: Application Executed Non-Executable Extension
query: (process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND (NOT ((NOT _exists_:process.command_line) OR (process.command_line:*.dll* OR process.command_line:"") OR (process.parent.executable:*\:\\Program\ Files\\Internet\ Explorer\\iexplore.exe AND process.command_line:*.cpl*) OR (process.parent.executable:*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\msiexec.exe AND process.command_line:C\:\\Windows\\syswow64\\MsiExec.exe\ \-Embedding*) OR (process.parent.executable:*\:\\Windows\\System32\\msiexec.exe AND process.command_line:C\:\\Windows\\system32\\MsiExec.exe\ \-Embedding*))))
author: Tim Shelton
Florian Roth
